description:
The first thing people saw when they searched Google for the artist Hieronymus Bosch was an AI-generated version of his Garden of Earthly Delights, one of the most famous paintings in art history.

Depending on what they are searching for, Google Search sometimes serves users a series of images above
title: Google Serves AI Slop as Top Result for One of the Most Famous Paintings in History

description: The Air Force has contracted with a company called Qylur, whose tool is designed to continuously improve the AI systems of autonomous devices such as drones and UAVs.
title: The Air Force Is Researching a ‘MAD.AI’ That Would Adapt Drones to New Environments
